name: Oplugin
0:
”Alexa, turn on plug”
”Alexa, turn off plug”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With the Oplugin skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your smart socket devices by voice. To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button in the Alexa App to link your Oplugin account and discover your devices. 
When using the skill, you need established names for your devices. You can use the Oplugin App to set up the device name,Once you know the name for your devices, you can say the following:
"Alexa, turn on plug"
"Alexa, turn off plug"



How to use “ Oplugin” Mobile Application
1、Install “ Oplugin” from App Store
2、Register your account and login 
3、Click the “+” symbol
4、Choose the device model
5、Setup the device wifi 
6、Change the device name
7、then , you can control your device by mobile Application

If you have any questions, please visit the Oplugin app manual "http://www.huihetech.cn/Oplugin_User_Guide_Alexa.pdf"
